bio: Hailing from Indore, Jalaj Saxena is a right-arm off-spinner. He made his debut for Madhya Pradesh in 2005. Saxena is a handy all-rounder with his useful contributions with bat and ball. He was signed by the Mumbai franchise for the sixth edition of the Indian T20 League in 2013 and re-signed the next year as well for the seventh edition for 90 lakhs.
